page.title: 06JOHN MARTIN LTD.
page.content: Civil Engineers specialising in Marine projects. Work up to 150 miles away, on harbours, bridges and sea defences. Recent projects include the Orwell Bridge at Ipswich, and Lowestoft port. Problems include vandalism on site and restricted government spending on major projects.{John Martin Ltd}has been on the airfield for 12 years and employs 40 people full time. {S.B. VINCENT LTD.}Produce duck food for a large duck farm belonging to the company at Ellingham.They produce 200 tons of pellets a week. Basic ingredients are stored in silos holding up to 700 tons of wheat, soya oil, fish meal, binder and meat extract. These must be kept dry to avoid weevils and mould. Also there is a problem with rats and mice. Rentokil visits every month. The company employs 4 people.
